poll.ownerContext: This is your poll. Want to make any changes?

index.ingress: Empower your voice and make every vote count with our interactive polling app. Create, vote on, and explore polls with ease. Join the community of active participants today and be part of the conversation.
index.agreement: By signing in, you agree to our %{termsOfService} and %{privacyPolicy}.

home.ingress:
Below, you'll find a list of your own polls, as well as polls from other users.
Feel free to share your thoughts!

error.pageNotFoundIngress: We couldn't find the page you were looking for
error.serverErrorIngress:
Whoops! Something weird is going on
Don't worry, we have received a report of the issue

notifications.emailAlreadyInvitedDesc: This email has already been invited to this poll
notifications.pollCreatedDesc: Your poll has been created successfully
notifications.pollNotFoundDesc: Poll with ID {id} was not found
notifications.copiedToClipboardDesc: The poll URL has been copied to your clipboard
notifications.couldntCopyToClipboardDesc: Couldn't copy the poll URL to your clipboard
